songs.title: All the Boys
songs.album: Too Weird to Live, Too Rare to Die!
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
She don't leave make-up
After her kiss
All the boys at night
Think that she's theirs
All the secrets that you keep
Might get spoken while you sleep

[Chorus]
And all the boys and I
All the boys and I
Love her madly
All the boys and I
All the girls and I too (Oh, oh!)
Picture girls we want so badly
Isn't she a dream come true?

[Verse 2]
Closer now
And closer still
Dance closer to her
'Til she knows you're there
And all our secrets that you keep
Might get spoken while you sleep

[Chorus]
And all the boys and I
All the boys and I
Love her madly
All the boys and I
All the girls and I too (Oh, oh!)
Picture girls we want so badly
Isn't she a dream come true?

[Bridge]
She came here to entertain you
You'll fall hard into her charm

[Chorus]
All the boys and I
All the boys and I
Love her madly
All the boys and I
All the girls and I too (Oh, oh!)
Picture girls we want so badly
Isn't she a dream come true?
All the boys and I
All the boys and I
Love her madly
All the boys and I
All the girls and I too (Oh, oh!)
Picture girls we want so badly
Isn't she a dream come true?
